skillDescription: Call upon divine power to bring down a massive sword# targeting a specific area. Dealing massive damage to all enemies within the impact zone.
Attacks the enemy by dropping a star of destruction created by the power of darkness# exploding on impact.
An atomic missile bombards the marked area dealing damage to all enemies within the zone.
Throw a smoke bomb infused with shadow energy. Upon impact# the bomb release a thick cloud of smoke that explodes!
